title: Another Ultimate Skin From Hextech Crafting
body: I think this game loves me, a while ago a made a post stating how I got Pulse Fire Ezreal From a Hextech chest. Anyway, here we are a few months later, I've been playing some new champs and I got some more chests. I open them up, what do I get? DJ Sona, along with a Legacy skin for Soraka, Reaper Soraka. I must be kinda lucky to get these things also considering the factor I main support I don't mind playing both of these champions from time to time.

replies.body: I'm still waiting for a DJ Sona token so I can craft it with my PF Ezreal and SG Udyr.
